channel.title: The Calling 718 || Autodonate || Autovote || uptime 100% || loads of content
channel.description:
[center][img]http://thecalling718.com/Header.png[/img] Hello and welcome to The Calling 718 advertisement thread!
Here on The Calling we don't update by what we think our community will like, we ask each individual what they would like to see put into the server.
[SPOILER=Links]Links: Website: [url=http://www.thecalling718.com]The Calling 718[/url] Client download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/z8zodh80f929nu6/The_Calling.jar]The Calling[/url][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Bosses:]Bosses: Vorago Kalphite King Legio Sextus Bandos Armadyl Zamorak Saradomin Nex Corp Sunfreet Bork Mercenary Mage Tormented Demons KBD QBD Hope Devourer Har'Lakk Avatar of Destruction Daggonoth Kings Trio Warmonger Glacors Revs Gano beasts Dragon lair [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Content:]Content: Prestige system that goes to 25 with titles + shops 3 Donator ranks that give xp boost for each rank Auto Donation Auto vote Skilling teleports Custom skilling interfaces Unique donator zone Custom dungeoneering Warriors Guild Well of fortune - gives drop boosts depending on amount placed in well, minimum = 500k maximum = 750m Crystal key chest will random armor + money rewards Custom shield making for level 90 barrows shields[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=RS3 Items:]RS3 Items: merciless kiteshield malevolent kiteshield vengeful kiteshield Dual Ascensions Seismic wand Seismic singularity Fully working tetsu Sea singer's Reinforcing plate Tectonic energy Malevolent energy 120 capes Drygores plus there off-hands Ascension Partyhat all 6 Ascension signits[/SPOILER]

item.title: The Calling 718 || Autodonate || Autovote || uptime 100% || loads of content
item.dc:creator: @CamelCrusher CamelCrusher
item.description:
@CamelCrusher wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:2, topic:548480”]Looking good, will stop by and play for a bit and give my opinion.
Might as well make a video for my youtube channel as a review. ;D

Made a short video looking around at the server.
I noticed straight away there’s no timer for the server restart, and the ::commands interface can’t be closed.

Still rendering HD will be available in a bit.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VvpOx636Nc&feature=youtu.be[/quote]
Thanks a lot man

Read full topic
item.source: The Calling 718 || Autodonate || Autovote || uptime 100% || loads of content

item.title: The Calling 718 || Autodonate || Autovote || uptime 100% || loads of content
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Looking good, will stop by and play for a bit and give my opinion.
Might as well make a video for my youtube channel as a review. ;D

Made a short video looking around at the server.
I noticed straight away there’s no timer for the server restart, and the ::commands interface can’t be closed.

Still rendering HD will be available in a bit.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VvpOx636Nc&feature=youtu.be

Read full topic
item.source: The Calling 718 || Autodonate || Autovote || uptime 100% || loads of content

[center]
Hello and welcome to The Calling 718 advertisement thread!

Here on The Calling we don’t update by what we think our community will like, we ask each individual what they would like to see put into the server.

Crystal key chest will random armor + money rewards
